original_title: Prima Veras saga om Olav den Hellige
overview: The film describes Olav life from his birth to his death at the Battle of Stiklestad in year 1030. All central place names and people 's actual , but otherwise there happens not fully consistent with the history book. An informal version of the saga of St. Olaf .
title: Prima Veras saga om Olav den Hellige
